title: 整合莫名崩溃
author: fgtye
txt_content:
崩溃日志
Type: Minecraft Crash
Minecraft已崩溃
---- Minecraft崩溃报告 ----
// I feel sad now :(

Time: 19-8-24 ????1:11

replies.author: Xiaoxinzhi
replies.txt_content: 空指向异常。删掉光影核心重启游戏即可。

replies.author: 资深咸鱼
replies.txt_content: 删掉名为ShadersTex的文件，或称光影着色器
